logo.name: HappyPawsLogo
logo.description: The HappyPaws logo featuring a playful, paw-shaped icon with a vibrant color palette that symbolizes energetic and happy dogs.

sections.title: Welcome to HappyPaws!
sections.subtitle: Where Every Dog's Tail Wags with Joy
sections.name: hero-banner
sections.label: Hero
sections.content: Join the HappyPaws family and give your furry friend the joy of daily adventures! Our experienced dog walkers are passionate about providing safe, fun, and rejuvenating walks for your beloved pets. Register today and let’s start tail-wagging journeys together!

images.name: HappyDogsOutdoor
images.description: A joyful group of dogs playing in the park as displayed on the Hero section.

sections.title: About Us
sections.subtitle: Our Mission and Values
sections.name: about-us
sections.label: About
sections.content: At HappyPaws, we believe every dog deserves happiness and freedom to explore the world safely. Established by dog enthusiasts, we pride ourselves on exceptional service, reliability, and the personalized care we offer to both dogs and their owners.

images.name: DogWalkerBackground
images.description: An inviting image showing a serene park with a path lined with trees, used as the background for the About Us section.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: Tailored Walks for Every Dog
sections.name: services
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
- **Customizable Walk Schedules**: Choose your convenient days and times for walk appointments.
- **Experienced Walkers**: Trained to handle dogs of all sizes and temperaments.
- **Flexible Pricing**: Fees range based on dog size, starting from $10.

Your pet’s safety and enjoyment are prioritized in every walking service we offer.

images.name: DogWalkingService
images.description: Image of a dog walker holding multiple leashes, representing the walking services offered.

sections.title: Testimonials
sections.subtitle: What Our Clients Say
sections.name: testimonials
sections.label: Testimonials
sections.content:
"HappyPaws has been a game-changer for us! Our dog Max always comes back happier and calmer after his walks. Highly recommend!" - Jane D.

"Reliable and super friendly service. My schedules are tricky, but they always accommodate my needs." - Alex T.

images.name: SatisfiedOwner
images.description: Image of a smiling dog owner with their pet, showcasing their satisfaction with HappyPaws.

sections.title: Pricing Plans
sections.subtitle: Affordable Walks for Your Furry Friend
sections.name: pricing
sections.label: Pricing
sections.content:
Choose from flexible pricing based on your dog’s size:
- **Small Dogs**: $10 per walk
- **Medium Dogs**: $20 per walk
- **Large Dogs**: $30 per walk
- **Group Discounts**: Available upon request

images.name: DogSizePricing
images.description: Infographic displaying pricing tiers based on different dog sizes.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.subtitle: Get In Touch
sections.name: contact-us
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
We're thrilled to help you with all your dog walking needs. Reach out to us at:

- **Phone**: +123-456-7890
- **Email**: contact@happypaws.com
- **Address**: 123 Canine Avenue, Dogtown, USA

Or fill out our contact form for quick responses.

images.name: BusinessLocationMap
images.description: A map showing the location of the HappyPaws office.
